channel.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
channel.description:
Title says all.
And if you don't play Runescape, or don't follow up with RS, don't post.
[b]Basics[/b]
• Good editing (can be considered...?) • Kills

item.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I mean like create your own style
e.g. your own equipment setup and not what everyone uses (e.g. tanker gear etc.)

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?

item.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

Really good song, great chorus, try it for ur pking video.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?

item.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:14, topic:359581”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=456023.msg3339495#msg3339495 date=1284233768]
I wanna watch some shit in which the person’s gear is somewhat unique, he doesn’t suck ass and plays fair.
[/quote]

Unique as? Longbow pking lol? (I thought of this once, it was hard to pk :/)

PKing with an uncommon pure. Ex: 20 attack 90+ strength in F2P.

I also thought about it, but I’ve seen people have 30 att, addy 2h, and 90+ str in f2p. They hit like 23-28 (230-280s)[/quote]
I have 30 attack 94 strength and I hit 260+ in F2P.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?

I wanna watch some shit in which the person’s gear is somewhat unique, he doesn’t suck ass and plays fair.

Jc22493:

PKing with an uncommon pure. Ex: 20 attack 90+ strength in F2P.

I also thought about it, but I’ve seen people have 30 att, addy 2h, and 90+ str in f2p. They hit like 23-28 (230-280s)

item.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“all day, post:8, topic:359581”]Editing does not make a video, it simply destroys it. Too many people think just because they use Vegas 8 and give everyone who watches their video a headache that the video is decent. The kills matter, keep us entertained. Use your own music not what everyone else is using. I remember like five years ago everyone used Linkin Park, then Screamo, now it’s mainly mainstream dubstep.

I really enjoy Nukearcher’s videos, go check him out on youtube.[/quote]

I couldn’t agree with you more on your point.

Ya, his videos are pretty cool. But they are still edited.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?

item.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Pking basically is who has the best items. If you have turmoil/divine your going to get kills. If not then it will be a challenge.

I like hybrid pking videos, rushing, and 1v1 edge with dharok or other stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?

item.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:359581”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=456023.msg3338801#msg3338801 date=1284176816]

Real PK.

Please don’t troll, care to explain?

Current RS PK sucks, it shouldn’t even be called PKing.
[/quote]

Why the hell are you posting on this thread then? Do you know what pking even is? Player-Killing.[/quote]
Simply put: PKing isn’t the same.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?

item.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

Editing does not make a video, it simply destroys it. Too many people think just because they use Vegas 8 and give everyone who watches their video a headache that the video is decent. The kills matter, keep us entertained. Use your own music not what everyone else is using. I remember like five years ago everyone used Linkin Park, then Screamo, now it’s mainly mainstream dubstep.

I really enjoy Nukearcher’s videos, go check him out on youtube.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?

item.title: What do you want in a RS Pking Video?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Stupit:

Commentary is a must have. Good music.

Really? I find that annoying. Sparc Mac is the only good one I know of with commentary though.

[quote=“Muroth, post:3, topic:359581”]Heavy metal background music with a commentary
Make it not boring[/quote]

I find it boring, when every pk vid has heavy metal to it personally.

Rixxx:

Real PK.

Please don’t troll, care to explain?

Read full topic
